{{DisambigMsg|the cloak in {{poe2}}|the cloak in {{poe1}}|Cloak of the Obsidian Order}}

| icon           = poe2 cloak_obsidian_order icon.png
| description    = The Obsidian Order is shrouded in mystery, with even the Hand Occult having few clues about their origins. Some scholars have speculated that the order's members are a diverse group from all over Eora, brought together by their love of exploration, fierce battle, and wondrous stories. It is rumored they played a role in the defeat of Thaos. Their presence in the Deadfire indicates world-shaking events to come.
